props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our Composition guide for more details.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with item

props.name: displayValue
props.description: The display value of input for selected item. Does not work with multiple.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the filter. Can be binded with with v-model.
